meanings.definition: A style of painting and sculpture in which objects are depicted with photographic realism.
meanings.sent1: The artist's superrealism captured every detail of the flower perfectly.
meanings.sent2: Her superrealism artwork made it hard to distinguish between a photo and a painting.
meanings.sent3: In the art gallery, the superrealism piece fooled visitors into thinking the apple was real.
meanings.sent4: The superrealism of the sculpture made it seem like the marble figure could come to life.
meanings.sent5: The superrealism of the landscape painting transported viewers into the scene itself.

meanings.definition: The quality or state of being superrealistic.
meanings.sent1: The superrealism of the portrait was so lifelike that it seemed to breathe.
meanings.sent2: The superrealism of the movie special effects made the audience gasp in amazement.
meanings.sent3: His claim of having seen a ghost had a touch of superrealism that made his friends chuckle.
meanings.sent4: The superrealism of her storytelling painted vivid pictures in the listener's mind.
meanings.sent5: The superrealism of the actor's performance brought tears to the eyes of the audience.
